body_html: Your original reference "#1044" should point to the one in protobuf. And I am confused of the "64 bit platform" you were referring to, until I notice it is probably mips64. It would be better if you could make that clear, as current master has no problem building on x86-64.
body_text: Your original reference "#1044" should point to the one in protobuf. And I am confused of the "64 bit platform" you were referring to, until I notice it is probably mips64. It would be better if you could make that clear, as current master has no problem building on x86-64.
body: Your original reference "#1044" should point to the one in [protobuf](https://github.com/google/protobuf/pull/1044). And I am confused of the "64 bit platform" you were referring to, until I notice it is probably `mips64`. It would be better if you could make that clear, as current master has no problem building on `x86-64`.
